gemini.instruction: Analyze the codebase to prepare for Phase 28 (Macro-Stability Stress Testing). TASKS: 1. Identify all configurable economic variables in 'simulation/config.py' and 'modules/common/config_manager'. 2. Propose 3 stress scenarios: 'Hyperinflation' (High Demand/Low Supply), 'Deflationary Spiral' (Low Demand/Hoarding), and 'Supply Shock' (Productivity Collapse). 3. Map which Agent behaviors (e.g., 'price_sensitivity', 'panic_selling') need to be parameterized for these tests. OUTPUT: 'design/gemini_output/analysis_phase28_stress_scenarios.md'.

jules.title: TD-008_Finance_Upgrade
jules.instruction: Implement TD-008: Finance System Upgrade. TASKS: 1. Create 'BailoutCovenant' dataclass in api.py. 2. Update BailoutLoanDTO.covenants type from Dict to BailoutCovenant. 3. Modify grant_bailout_loan to use new class. 4. Add Google-style docstrings to calculate_altman_z_score and evaluate_solvency. 5. Create tests/test_finance_bailout.py with covenant type check, money flow verification, and regression tests. TARGET_FILES: modules/finance/api.py, modules/finance/system.py, simulation/components/finance_department.py. SPEC: design/specs/TD-008_Finance_Upgrade_Spec.md. CONSTRAINTS: Do NOT touch Frontend files.

git_review.instruction: Analyze this PR. Check implementation completeness, test coverage, SoC compliance, and potential regressions.

harvest.note: Report Harvester takes no direct arguments in JSON usually.
